00022 #ifndef _PacketIterator_h
00023 #define _PacketIterator_h
00024 #include "BasicVRTPacket.h"
00025 
00026 // Note: This file is titled "PacketIterator" and not "ConstPacketIterator" as
00027 //       it is intended that a future version may provide a non-const iterator
00028 //       in here titled "PacketIterator" (which would match the Java).
00029 
00030 namespace vrt {
00031   class PacketContainer;
00032 
00041   class ConstPacketIterator : public VRTObject {
00042     public: friend class AbstractVRAFile;
00043     public: friend class BasicVRLFrame;
00044     public: friend class PacketContainer;
00045 
00046     private: const PacketContainer *container; // The container.
00047     private: bool                   resolve;   // Should the packet type be resolved?
00048     private: int64_t                offset;    // The current offset.
00049     private: int64_t                length;    // Length of current packet (-1 if n/a)
00050     private: vector<char>           buf;       // Buffer used when reading the packet.
00051 
00057     public: ConstPacketIterator (const PacketContainer *container, int64_t offset, bool resolve=true);
00058 
00060     public: ConstPacketIterator (const ConstPacketIterator &pi);
00061 
00063     public: ~ConstPacketIterator () { }
00064 
00066     public: virtual string toString () const;
00067 
00068     using VRTObject::equals;
00070     public: virtual bool equals (const VRTObject &obj) const {
00071       try {
00072         const ConstPacketIterator *pi = checked_dynamic_cast<const ConstPacketIterator*>(&obj);
00073         return equals(*pi);
00074       }
00075       catch (VRTException e) {
00076         UNUSED_VARIABLE(e);
00077         return false;
00078       }
00079     }
00080 
00082     public: virtual bool equals (const ConstPacketIterator &pi) const;
00083 
00085     public: ConstPacketIterator operator++ (int); // postfix ++
00086 
00088     public: ConstPacketIterator operator++ (); // prefix ++
00089 
00091     public: BasicVRTPacket* operator* ();
00092   };
00093 
00097   class PacketContainer {
00099     public: PacketContainer () { }
00100 
00102     public: virtual ~PacketContainer () { }
00103 
00110     public: virtual void gotoNextPacket (ConstPacketIterator &pi) const = 0;
00111 
00119     public: virtual BasicVRTPacket* getThisPacket (ConstPacketIterator &pi, bool skip)
00120                                                       const __attribute__((warn_unused_result)) = 0;
00121 
00130     public: virtual ConstPacketIterator begin () const = 0;
00131 
00135     public: virtual ConstPacketIterator end () const = 0;
00136   };
00137 } END_NAMESPACE
00138 #endif /* _PacketIterator_h */
